title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 300 - Local Welfare Administration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 300 - Local Welfare Administration

State Regulations
§ 300.1 - Deputation to act as authorizing official
§ 300.2 - Reports of district organization and operation
§ 300.3 - Recording and internal distribution of official releases
§ 300.4 - [Repealed]
§ 300.5 - Availability of program manuals and public issuances
§ 300.6 - Review by the State commissioner of local rules, regulations and procedures
§ 300.7 - Coordination of services by the social services district
§ 300.8 - Local social services cooperation with department
§ 300.9 - Local Flexibility Incentive Pilot Program
§ 300.10 - Legal services on a fee-for-service basis
§ 300.11 - Research and demonstration projects
§ 300.12 - [Repealed]
§ 300.13 - Desk reviews of the distribution and disbursement of support collections

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 300

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§20, 34, 36-b, 80, 110-a, 136, 355, 363-a, 364-j, 369-e e; Public Health Law, §§201, 206; L. 1971, ch. 110, § 83

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
